comment.author: 52325611@N05
comment._content: Marie Gräfin zu Castell-Rüdenhausen (1864-1942) and her daughter Juliane Prinzessin zu Stolberg-Wernigerode (1899-1969). Please see Marie, Countess of Castell-Rüdenhausen and her daughter Princess Juliane of Stolberg-Werningen | Grand Ladies | gogm as well.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC, note that the mother is a Countess, and that it is Wernigerode, not Werningen. royaltyguide.nl/families/castell/castellrudenhausen1.htm royaltyguide.nl/families/stolberg/stolbergwernigerode2.htm

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: flyvapnet and artolog: thanks for finding more information and the correct names for the two individuals.  We will update our record.
